description.raw:
The University of Florida team has been testing the “Avoid Obstacles” challenge in gazebo. We would like to contribute our work upstream for other team’s use.

‌

This challenge contains a random obstacle course of the 3 sized sphere buoys within a 40x40 meter zone. This zone is marked in the 4 corners by the white surmark tower buoy. The implementation of this challenge uses a python script to randomly generate the positions of these buoys and from this the sdf. This python script is run automatically as a CMake target.

‌

As it appears in the rules:

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/bajKz4z/images/3167638110-obstacle_course_robotx.png)
Screenshot from gazebo:

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/bajKz4z/images/2174848839-obstaclecourse.png)
